description: Prompts empowering product managers to define vision, prioritize work, and deliver impactful experiences.

prompts.title: Product Vision Narrative
prompts.prompt: As a Principal Product Manager, craft a compelling product vision for {{product_or_problem_space}}. Describe the customer promise, differentiated value, and how it ladders to company strategy.

prompts.title: Opportunity Assessment
prompts.prompt: As a Principal Product Manager, evaluate the opportunity for {{idea_or_feature}}. Size TAM/SAM/SOM, analyze competitors, and recommend whether to pursue, pivot, or pause.

prompts.title: Outcome-Based Roadmap
prompts.prompt: As a Principal Product Manager, build an outcome-focused roadmap for the next {{time_horizon}}. Organize initiatives by customer outcomes, business metrics, and delivery sequencing.

prompts.title: Prioritization Framework
prompts.prompt: As a Principal Product Manager, create a prioritization framework for backlog items in {{product_area}}. Compare RICE, MoSCoW, and custom scoring, then apply to the top {{item_count}} items.

prompts.title: Product Requirements Document (PRD)
prompts.prompt: As a Principal Product Manager, draft a PRD for {{feature}}. Include problem statement, user stories, acceptance criteria, success metrics, guardrails, and cross-team dependencies.

prompts.title: Beta Program Plan
prompts.prompt: As a Principal Product Manager, design a beta program for {{feature}}. Define participant criteria, onboarding process, feedback loops, exit criteria, and communication cadences.

prompts.title: Metrics & Instrumentation
prompts.prompt: As a Principal Product Manager, identify north-star and counter metrics for {{product_area}}. Propose instrumentation requirements, dashboards, and review rituals to ensure data quality.

prompts.title: Pricing & Packaging
prompts.prompt: As a Principal Product Manager, recommend pricing and packaging updates for {{product}}. Analyze willingness-to-pay signals, segment needs, competitive benchmarks, and rollout considerations.

prompts.title: Stakeholder Alignment
prompts.prompt: As a Principal Product Manager, outline a stakeholder alignment plan for {{initiative}}. Map concerns, tailor messaging, schedule touchpoints, and set decision timelines.

prompts.title: Experiment Backlog
prompts.prompt: As a Principal Product Manager, compile an experiment backlog to validate assumptions about {{product_or_feature}}. Provide hypotheses, success metrics, and guardrails for each experiment.
